== Cherukavu (CT) (627467) ==

Cherukavu (CT) is a town in the [[Ernad]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 14.51 sq. km. and harbouring 6063 households with total population of 30126 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 37 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 415 km. Male population is 14778 and female population is 15348. Scheduled Caste population is 2455 and Scheduled Tribes population is 43. Census Location Code of the town is 627467<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 37 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 24 km. Railway station is at Feroke at a distance of 10 km.
